component.name: Digger
component.summary: DNS lookup tool with graphical interface

description.p: Digger provides a user-friendly graphical interface for DNS queries, making it easy to look up domain information without using command-line tools. It supports all common record types and presents results in a clear, organized format.
Perfect for network administrators, developers, and anyone who needs to troubleshoot DNS issues or explore domain configurations.

description.p: This release features a refreshed application icon with improved visual design and better integration with modern desktop environments.

First stable release featuring comprehensive DNS lookup capabilities with query history, advanced options, and modern GTK4 interface. Includes full support for all common record types and improved user experience.
Minor release with scalable icon cleanup.
